participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
i take fridays off in the summer.
i like to listen to music.
my favorite band is radiohead.
I wish I could be the kind of person my parents want me to be.

participant_2.background:
I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I would not be able to weld if I was blind because I need to see the metal I am welding.
i eat junk food.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.

content.text: Hi, I'm trying to learn how to cook more healthy meals, because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
That's a great goal! I like to listen to music while I cook. What's your favorite band?
I like Radiohead. What do you like to cook?
I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs. Do you have any hobbies?
I want to be more active, but I just don't have the motivation. I think I'll start by taking Fridays off in the summer.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot. What do you like to do in your free time?
I wish I could be the kind of person my parents want me to be. What do you want to do with your life?
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition. I'm a welder, and I wouldn't be able to do my job if I was blind.
